website_summaries.verdict: The 1980s best-selling Dixon Trainer shoe gets a retro look with the drop of the Saucony DXN Trainer. Although this reformatted model is no longer fitted for running, it will keep you literally on your toes for several hours without getting foot discomforts.It may feel tight straight from the box but the synthetic leather detailing is forgiving, which makes it a bang for the buck. You can wear this with strings of casual wear, from jeans to scrubs.
pros: As described by some users, the Saucony DXN Trainer comes with lovely synthetic upper detailing
This sneaker looks fantastic with tapered jeans and so convenient to wear around town
One reviewer uses this for work during long shifts in the hospital
Several noted that this DXN sneaker goes perfectly well with thin socks
One of the most comfortable shoes worn by several reviewers
It offers excellent cushioning, as expressed by more than a hundred reviewers
This sneaker exceeded the expectations of many reviewers regarding comfort
A smart looking retro sneaker that’s ideal for styling up as commented by many
Some loyalists of Saucony’s performance running shoes adored the style and comfort of this remake model
It is far better than other competing brands and comes at a more reasonable price
It held up almost perfectly, stated by some
cons: A reviewer with wide feet mentioned that it tends to be a little tight in the midfoot
After a week of constant use, the heel collapsed and is noticeably lower than other parts of the insole, one user recounted
One Saucony fan said it fits tighter on the toe region than a Saucony Jazz Classic

customer_reviews.title: Look great but SO UNCOMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Horribly disappointed. I had a pair of Jazz, years ago, and they were amazingly comfortable. I had high hopes since people claimed these were so comfortable. I'm not sure if it's that a lot of newer shoes seem more cheaply made, but these were the most UNCOMFORTABLE shoes I've ever worn.. I've literally worn cleats that felt better, right out of the box. I normally wear a men's 9, but took people's advice to get a half size up. A 9.5 was perfect. But the sole.. so damn hard!! And zero arch support. After only an hour, my feet were pissed off, veins flaring, and calves cramping up. Returning them 🙁
customer_reviews.author: cass

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Classy Retro. Not sure on quality
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable smart casual retro shoes. I'm a fan of Saucony's performance running shoes, so I thought I'd try their casual shoes. Very nice. I ended up getting 10 whereas I usually wear 10.5 in the Saucony performance running shoes. That's probably normal, as you need a little bit more space when you are running. Update, after 1 week the left heel collapsed and is noticeably lower than the rest of the footbed. Disappointing. I'm not sure if this is a one-off fault, or if other people have the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O

customer_reviews.title: Im a fan of Saucony now.
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys are awesome for the price point. Nice suede. A little tight in the middle but that's cause I have wide feet. I got the blue pair and they look awesome with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: daftchild89

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love as soon as I put them on
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned; very nice and cushiony. It's like walking on a thick yoga mat. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jellie

customer_reviews.title: WIN!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. They are far better then some of the other competing brands and a way better price. I bought them for a trip through Holland and Belgium. They are super comfy and good looking enough to wear around town or dress up a little. I've been wearing them almost every day ever since and they are holding up perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Material isn’t great quality
customer_reviews.text: Originally I loved these shoes but 6 months later I couldn’t really recommend them. I keep my nails short but somehow my toes has worn through the tip of the shoe, which doesn’t speak much for the quality of the material. Also the insole has had a tendency to slide backward in the shoe causing me to take it off and readjust. Overall I love Saucony shoes but these were a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Retro look, be sure wide enough before ordering
customer_reviews.text: At first, my son thought they weren't quite wide enough but with thin socks he normally wears they were fine. If you have wider feet you may need to go up a size or try on Sauconys in a retail store to be sure of the fit before ordering here. The online price is better but be sure of the way Sauconys fit first.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of these shoes from the Saucony website. I bought the second through Amazon because of the availability and pricing. These shoes are snug on a wide (ish) foot, but have some give, as to not strangle your feet. They are very comfortable, durable, and provide great arch-support. If only Saucony made more colors of this style of shoe, I would be buying even more.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Code? wheres the pick up box code?
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer but Amazon sent a pick up box code somewhere, (i didn't have my phone, went back home and looked through my account, found it in my email) without informing me there was even a code, wasted time. The shoe fits snug and flat, great for my 20, 30 and 40 yard wind sprints, but i change to a thicker sole for 1/4 miles, track timing and distant running. It's lite, has good traction, would buy another in fall. UPDATE 1 MONTH USE; It's outer sole wear's out continuously and leaves fine black particles all over the floor, the build itself is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: A Old Classic Has Made a Comeback
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is similar to the Dixon Trainer running shoe that was sold in the mid 1980s. It is fully slip lasted and has a triple density midsole. Initially the shoe felt somewhat narrow in the forefoot, but that disappeared after walking in them for a couple of days. I then ran in these shoes a couple of times and enjoyed the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Patton

customer_reviews.title: Damn I look good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look even better in person. They add the perfect pop of color to my work uniform. Lots of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Stopmyheart

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for a friend. His review: These ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend. His review: These shoes run a little narrow. Order a half size up to make up for the width. I normally wear a 9.5. I ordered a 9.5, and wish there was a 9.5 wide available. However, i continued to break into the 9.5s and the width is stretching out slowly ( after 1 week of wearing).
customer_reviews.author: D. Hou

customer_reviews.title: An underrated shoe but certainly not the best looks. It would be nice if Saucony would ...
customer_reviews.text: An underrated shoe but certainly not the best looks. It would be nice if Saucony would give us the Jazz Low with more dense soles, like this DXN trainer. I like this shoe for comfort, but it doesn't look at good as the less substantial Jazz Low.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable shoes at an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable bang for the buck, got these at $30 and they are by far the most stylish and comfortable shoes I've owned in a long time. Already gotten multiple compliments on them. Can't speak to durability, but at that price who cares? Also, I'm between a 11.5 and a 12 and got the 12, which are fairly loose. Order on the smaller side if you're between like me
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They fit perfectly and I like the fact that they came with 4 different color laces. I can change the laces to match whatever I'm wearing. The only thing I had to do was change the insole because it's very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good retro style at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Good retro style at an affordable price. Definitely would get the same shoe again. I wish it came in better colors. So far it's been holding up as a good secondary shoe.
customer_reviews.author: haruman

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 10.5 Men originally but it was too small. I would say these run about a half size smaller than normal. Return was quick and hassle-free and they shipped an 11 Men quickly. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: When You Wanna Be A Super Slick Boy
customer_reviews.text: You buy these super slick red sneakers? We you must be super slick boy. Congrats.
customer_reviews.author: Rossco

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these as I have had great success with Saucony Original shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as I have had great success with Saucony Original shoes. I wasn't completely sure about the style and color when I ordered. Once I received these and opened the box I was impressed . The quality is amazing, and the design is simplistic but detailed. I purchased the blue color and they ended up a bit brighter than the pictures. Similar in style to the New Balance Originals but I feel as though the Saucony's are a bit more stylish and not as common. I will be keeping these on my list and looking for a sale as I would certainly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for style, but also a solid contender for a daily running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe - I have used this for running, and recently ran a solid 15 mile run. This is a no-frills, medium drop shoe with fantastic grip. The shoe fits true to size...NOT wide, but also not narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Cross

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, comfortable, quality. Item as described, colors always seem to be a little off when trying to match to other articles of clothing
customer_reviews.author: tyler frank

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable shoes. I bought them to try them as running shoes, which they aren't that great for. However, they're fantastic "all day" walking around shoes. I wear them to lift, go out, and as my primary pair of work shoes. I'm a personal trainer so I'm on my feet for 8-12 hours a day and these never feel uncomfortable. They also have a pretty grippy sole, which is a nice bonus. Plus you can find cheap color combos on Amazon and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit tight in the toe area. Much tighter than the Jazz Classics I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, good looking. I am using this shoes for work with my scrubs.
customer_reviews.author: Tanik

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: If you like the 'bullet' style this offers more cushioning
customer_reviews.author: BelloqNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great for walkers, mild runners.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic running shoe. Nice looking. Not super advanced for trained runners. Modest runners, these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love em! Great shoes and incredibly comfortable. Love the look and easier to keep clean than one would think.
customer_reviews.author: M. Foster

customer_reviews.title: better than on the pictures
customer_reviews.text: High quality, better than on the pictures. Very light. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: rezi

customer_reviews.title: The prefect retro profile and fit, without sacrificing cushion ...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect retro profile and fit, without sacrificing cushion and support. Have gotten lots of random compliments and questions about where I got these. Just bought a second pair, because I haven't found anything to replace them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not enough cushion for me. Also, insole is not removable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: surprisingly comfortable...the red was more on the red-pink side, but I liked the feel so I just kept them.
customer_reviews.author: SilverZorro

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, not as comfortable as my husband would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Ambar

customer_reviews.title: So light.  So comfortable.  So fresh.  Get you some.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I own or have owned about a dozen pairs of Saucony shoes. These are my new favorites. The styling is dope. The tread is great. Super fresh shoe especially if you can get your size/color combo for under $30.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang St Croix

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who needed simple, sturdy shoes for work. Fit was perfect he said (10.5)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs EFT

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product is very misleading. The first bullet point says "50% leather, 50% synthetic." That is an outright lie. The "Red" pair that I received has only two tiny scraps of leather (which are mostly ornamental), at the top of the tongue and the top of the heel. There isn't anything necessarily wrong with selling canvas shoes, but it is wrong to describe them as half leather. And the fact is, it's not even a very good quality canvas. They're also smaller than other Sauconys I've had. That can be remedied with a slightly larger size, but the overall quality of the shoes I received was very disappointing for Saucony.
customer_reviews.author: glsmith

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Saucony's are the best. I usually get the jazz low pro (which I also love) but these were a really good price. they're just as good as the jazz low pro.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B Cohen

customer_reviews.title: My friends think they look like nurse shoes but I think they are comfy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair before and I decided to frisky buy one in a color I usually wouldn't wear. My friends think they look like nurse shoes but I think they are comfy and well designed. 10/10 for my dad look.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my son in law and he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M

customer_reviews.title: I love Dxn trainers but these came and were super right ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Dxn trainers but these came and were super right so I returned them and are currently waiting for a half size larger to be delivered. We shall see if those fit
customer_reviews.author: Connie A Holt

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect and it is very light weight. Nice look and very good design.
customer_reviews.author: RAYROW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love theses! They fit as expected and are incredibly compfortable. I've been a fan of this brand for a while and these do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: ppl like em! for $29
customer_reviews.text: FRESH! Compliments everywhere I go! theres alot of red shoes out there, but I havent seen THESE out in the streets, ppl like em! for $29??!!! its a deal!
customer_reviews.author: CoolHand Manny

customer_reviews.title: Size is smaller than other Saucony models...
customer_reviews.text: I love Saucony sneakers! I have Jazz, Jazz low pro, Shadow 5000, and many other models. I wear US11 in all these shoes and it is so comfortable. However, the DXN trainer US 11 is too narrow for me! What a pity... It think I will try US11.5 of DXN next time...
customer_reviews.author: Hsin-Yi LEE

customer_reviews.title: Teenager loves
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves these shoes - fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: R. Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Been wearing them every day for months and they are holding up well and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Justin J.

customer_reviews.title: Best running shows I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best running shows I've ever bought, so much so that I had to buy them another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They go great with jeans, and Im thinking about getting the red or blue ones as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Parisi

customer_reviews.title: still a good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheaper in person than expected; still a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Would recommend to
customer_reviews.text: Bought at a fairly low price. Very comfortable. Would recommend to runners
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These very well might be the most comfortable pair of shoes I've owned! I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable but be careful while selecting size
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable but be careful while selecting size. Generally I use European 43-44, but this shoe is very tight even size 44..
customer_reviews.author: George Alaverdashvili

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a gym trainer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a gym trainer. Not as high healed as a Shadow but more cushion than a Low Pro.
customer_reviews.author: C Church

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Saucony's, and own multiple pairs. Really loved this pair in the green & white.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: OK sneaker
customer_reviews.text: OK sneaker, but a bit cheaply made, not like the "old" Sauconys
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. Very comfortable. If you have wide feet, try a half size bigger because these shoes are known to be narrow. I'm a 10 and in this shoe use a 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable sneakers I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: cso

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best sneakers I've ever owned. I'm on my 3rd pair and will continue to buy these as long as they're available.
customer_reviews.author: Ka X.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable shoe at a nice price, that also looks good. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WmGriff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I went one half size up and love the fit!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Aceves

customer_reviews.title: Saucony DXN Trainer Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes. Could use better arch and sole support. Somewhat large but fit perfectly when used with Dr. Sholl's inner soles. Good quality leather.
customer_reviews.author: K&B @ WGV

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very comfortable shoe. I am on my feet all day at work and walk about 5 miles a day. For the price you can't beat these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Style is good. They feel a bit small compared to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Style is good. They feel a bit small compared to the Jazz, which have always been my go-to sneaker. They look very cool. Like a professional water skier.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Goon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers, I've been wearing these for about fifteen years.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and great performance.
customer_reviews.text: I can walk around all day on concrete with these and not experience any foot fatigue. The sole is excellent, it's firm but comfortable and with a very low heal.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: It would have been great if it has a ticker insole.
customer_reviews.text: The insole in too thin. But still somewhat comfortable. Will to buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Boyet

product_meta.title: Saucony DXN Trainer-w, Women’s Jazz Low Pro
product_meta.description: Classic and fun styling represents the Jazz Low Pro
